document.full_text: a doctor who the federal authorities said was one of the largest national dispensers of oxycodone, a powerful prescription painkiller, was convicted on tuesday of illegal distribution.
document.title: midwest: ohio: doctor found guilty on drug counts
lines_and_colors: a doctor who the federal authorities said was one of the largest national dispensers of oxycodone, a powerful prescription painkiller, was convicted on tuesday of illegal distribution.
